channel.title: 562 Item Bonuses
channel.description:
Simple question for anyone out there who knows: [b][size=14pt]"How do you change item bonuses on a 562(rs2hd) server?"[/size][/b] I'm trying to make a 'perfect' ring with 9999999999 stats. But after modifying the item files, saving, compiling, starting server, logging in, deleting all rings from previous attempts, and spawning a new one, the stat bonuses still won't show up.
[b]Please don't tell me to: 1. Open items.cfg and change 773 stats from 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 to 99 99 99 99 99 99 etc. 2. Open items.xml and change 773 stats 0 0 0 0... to 99 99 99 99... 3. Delete old rings.[/b]
I know that. Is there something simple I'm forgetting or something I don't realize? Any help is appreciated.

item.title: 562 Item Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @tim1247 tim1247
item.description:
@tim1247 wrote:

I tried exactly the same things but it just won’t work for me, someone please help

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Item Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @morningstar113 morningstar113
item.description:
@morningstar113 wrote:

Simple question for anyone out there who knows:
[size=14pt]“How do you change item bonuses on a 562(rs2hd) server?”[/size]
I’m trying to make a ‘perfect’ ring with 9999999999 stats. But after modifying the item files, saving, compiling, starting server, logging in, deleting all rings from previous attempts, and spawning a new one, the stat bonuses still won’t show up.

[b]Please don’t tell me to:

  1. Open items.cfg and change 773 stats from 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 to 99 99 99 99 99 99 etc.
  2. Open items.xml and change 773 stats 0 0 0 0… to 99 99 99 99…
  3. Delete old rings.[/b]

I know that.
Is there something simple I’m forgetting or something I don’t realize?
Any help is appreciated.

Read full topic
